title: pixel Charger wont able to charge my phone
content: My phone having charging issue with from last two days,i drop a complaint but have no result from #teampixel end,They dont have sufficient time slot for their own customer,the issue is that my charger wont be able to charge my phone and when i used third party charger it gets switch off and when i used my pixel charger to charge another phone then it is ok.please help me with that if anyone is having same issue
